title: Jacket
description: blue batik on coarse fabric; front cross stitch geometrics embroidered on 3 sides of center batik square; tiny embroidery on the square; sleeves heavily embroidered over white patches with more intricate embroidery in red and yellow on remainder of sleeve; back embroidered in various sizes of X\'s over batik; back tail completely covered with red, yellow and green embroidery with brown woven border and batik border; pullover
